report.title: A Pleasant Afternoon
report.author: Rice Paper
report.bodytext: This proved to be a very pleasant mix. /n /n 1.5g of P Cayanescens Mushrooms /n 2 Yellow Jackets [each contains 25mg ephedra alkaloids and 200mg caffeine alkaloids] /n /n T + 00:00 I eat 1.5 grams of the mushrooms, and swollow the two yellow jackets /n /n T + 00:10 I feel very good, euphoria. /n /n T + 00:30 Euphoria has grown quite a bit, beginning to get some visual distortions, with objects stretching and bending a bit. /n /n T + 01:00 Experience peaks. Good closed eye visuals, no nausea, feel very very good about myself, feel very energized and a very strong euphoria. /n /n Peak lasts for about 3 and a half hours. /n /n Coming down - the effects simply trail off. No negative after effects whatsoever. /n /n Afterward, I get a good nights sleep and wake up the next morning feeling wonderful. /n /n Provided for a very pleasant experience lasting about 4 to 5 hours with no negative side effects experienced.
